mood: Leadership carries heavy responsibility as a subtle turning of fortune begins.
positives: ◦ Deep connections formed by sharing honest
◦ Act on fortunes now before the energy settles.
◦ Constructive and dependable expression of your natural warmth.
cautions: ◦ Excessive spending on loved ones or projects to show care.

detailedPrediction: With the Moon in your sign, you feel more confident but must lead with maturity and honor. A subtle shift in luck is occurring, making this an ideal time to act on professional intuition. The planetary background in Capricorn requires you to stay disciplined and duty-bound.
generalAdvice: Lead with maturity. Sincerity is required over flirtation; honor your promises to maintain your growing prestige.
